Room.Name: Weaponsmith
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the elven weaponsmith's shoppe.
Room.LongDescription: The elven weaponsmith carries only the very best quality weapons. His prices are a little high, but elven quality cannot be exceeded. You see a lot of magical and strange weapons adorned on the walls, but (of course) these are not for sale. If you are looking for a missile weapon, try the bowyer on the south side of town. All weapons sold here have been enchanted by the resident mage.
